description:
Ok, I admit it. I wanted an easy shoot. I'd been worrying about mixing and matching the straight guys all month, and this was shot during the holiday rush when all the models are needing gigs for presents and travel. I have a limited amount of time to get them all in because they are all off shopping and traveling.
So I wanted to shoot a video where everyone was cool and easy going. Phenix loves to fuck, and Adam had been hinting that he wanted to get fucked. He's also been hinting about getting him in a sling, but for the life of me, I can't figure out how to suspend it!
There's are some super hard dicks, great cocksucking, awesome insert shots, and some to the point fuckin' in this video. They're both experts by now and it's a joy watching two pros do a dance.
title: Adam & Phenix - Wrapped
